General.Name: Dhunseri Investments Limited
General.Description: Dhunseri Investments Limited, a non-banking finance company, invests in shares and securities in India, Singapore, and internationally. It operates through Trading, Treasury Operations, Flexible Packaging Films, and Food and Beverages segment. The company operates bakery business of Twelve cupcakes; manufactures and sells BOPET films; and trades in PET resins. It also engages in the infrastructure business. The company was formerly known as DI Marketing Limited. The company was incorporated in 1997 and is based in Kolkata, India.
